text: 5 bone in chicken thigh fillets, peel skin OFF (Note 1)
label: ingredient

text: Fresh thyme leaves or finely chopped parsley
label: ingredient

text: Scatter onion and garlic in a baking dish (about 10 x 15" / 25 x 35 cm), then place butter in the centre. Bake for 15 minutes (check at 12 minutes, mix if some bits are browning too much).
label: step

text: Meanwhile, mix together Chicken Rub. Sprinkle on both sides of the chicken.
label: step

text: Remove baking dish from the oven. Add rice then mix.
label: step

text: Place chicken on rice. Then pour chicken broth and water around the chicken.
label: step

text: Cover with foil, then bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil, spray chicken with oil (optional, gives chicken nicer finish), then bake for a further 20 minutes until liquid is absorbed.
label: step

text: Stand for 5 minutes, then remove chicken and fluff up rice. Garnish with parsley or thyme if desired, serve and enjoy!
label: step

text: Dish is flavoured enough to serve without sauce, but if you want to take it over the top, make this quick Gravy in 4 minutes flat (pictured in video).
label: step
